text: Picks And Predictions For Week 17 vs. the Carolina Panthers - Seattle Seahawks
fullText: The Seattle Seahawks face the Panthers on December 28 at Bank of America Stadium as part of Week 17 of the 2025 season. Kickoff is set for 10:00 a.m. PT. Here’s what local and national media are predicting:

text: Brigitte Bardot, French femme fatale and cultural phenomenon, dies at 91 - The Washington Post
fullText: The actress and singer was a symbol of sexual revolution. She later became an animal-welfare campaigner and incendiary right-wing commenter.

fullText: Interstate 5 was closed for hours and a shelter-in-place was imposed after a gas line rupture north of Los Angeles.

text: Guinea votes in first election since 2021 coup with junta leader expected to win - AP News
fullText: Guineans are voting to elect a new president in the country’s first election since a 2021 coup. The election on Sunday features a weakened opposition with a total of nine candidates. Analysts have predicted a likely win for junta leader Gen. Mamadi Doumbouya.…

text: Derrick Henry’s 36 carries on Saturday night were the most in an NFL game in two years - NBC Sports
fullText: They don't make workhorse running backs like they used to, but Ravens running back Derrick Henry had a throwback game on Saturday night.

text: This is your teen’s brain on phones and social media, according to science - The Washington Post

text: For Ukrainians, a nuclear missile museum is a bitter reminder of what the country gave up - NPR
fullText: The Museum of Strategic Missile Forces tells the story of how Ukraine dismantled its nuclear weapons arsenal after independence in 1991. Today many Ukrainians believe that decision to give up nukes was a mistake.

text: Mercury: The planet that shouldn't exist - BBC
fullText: Mercury has long baffled astronomers because it defies much of what we know about planet formation. A new space mission arriving in 2026 might solve the mystery.

fullText: Thailand and Cambodia have signed a ceasefire agreement to end weeks of fighting over border disputes. The agreement, effective Saturday at noon, halts military movements and airspace violations. Thailand had conducted airstrikes in Cambodia as recently as Sa…
